trans-unit.source: ‘burn’ is a command-line tool to create audio discs from MP3, Ogg Vorbis, or WAV files, to backup data files, to create discs from ISO-9660 images, and to copy discs on-the-fly. It performs any of its functions in a single command, without requiring preparatory filesystem creation, etc.
trans-unit.target: “ burn”是一种命令行工具，用于从MP3，Ogg Vorbis或WAV文件创建音频光盘，备份数据文件，从ISO-9660映像创建光盘以及即时复制光盘。它只需一个命令即可执行其任何功能，而无需创建预备文件系统等。

trans-unit.source: Command-line tool for writing optical media.
trans-unit.target: 用于写入光学介质的命令行工具。

trans-unit.source: The program can compute if there is necessary free space for temporary files (images and audio files), warn if size is bigger than disc capacity, and manage multisession discs.
trans-unit.target: 该程序可以计算临时文件(图像和音频文件)是否有必要的可用空间,如果大小大于光盘容量,则发出警告,并管理多会话光盘。
